summary: Adds a Redguard follower based on my character to Jorrvaskr
descriptionHtml:
A follower mod, all default \'features\' of a follower included. Based on my character by request

1H Tank
essential, auto-level etc.
I can change the combat style or hair if you would like.
Will stay at spot and idle where you dismiss her, not a \'feature\' like others might tell you. it\'s called AI template.

-----------------
VERSION
[u]Ver 1[/u]
Adds follower to Jorrvaskr
------------------

INSTALL
Drop .bsa and .esp into Data folder
-Put at bottom of load list

------------------

Required mods
ApachiiSkyHair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Recommended mods

You will need these also to replicate my uploaded image:

Coverwomen by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
Covereyes by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
Nightmare Armor by Hentai
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13667
------------------
Creds to above for their awesome textures and meshes
author: YellowPaint
